content: enjoy using

Not sure why, but I can't delete this app!! I don't like Amazon & I don't want the app on my phone! My big mistake was downloading this app - but I had no idea it could not be deleted!! Very disappointing!

I like using the Amazon app. Lately, in the last few months, it has glitches. If I have it running in the background and go back to it, if I click the "cart" button, it will take me to the home screen. I usually click the button 3-4x, trying to see if the "cart" page appears. Lately, it doesn't and I have to close the app and re-open it. Today, I had to force close it. The glitch happens multiple times a week. Also, I wish that Prime members didn't have to pay for Amazon Fresh membership.

The app has been fine for years, until recently. Over the last 3-4 months the app takes me back to it's home screen, from my search results, any time that I tab out and back in. Even more recently, the last 2-3 weeks, the app has started returning to the home screen even if I'm not tabbing in or out. I can be in the middle of reading about a product and the app will just crash back to the opening/home screen. This becomes extremely annoying and problematic when doing in depth product research.

When you search for an item, no matter how specific your search query, Amazon gives you everything but what you're looking for or else it's way down the page after a multitude of stuff you're not looking for. Does Amazon think that by doing this they can sell you more than you were looking for? No, it just makes me buy what I was looking for from another vendor.
closed my account for nothing and didn't refund my orders so now I lost 100$ and customer support does nothing about it

so after many years of being a tried and true customer, I am done. I'm done with the lies, the deceit, the scams from their "3rd party sellers", and from the foreign presence in customer service being so poor with no real compassion for those of us who have been lied to time and time again. I may still buy things on Amazon because of convenience, but I will NOT pay for the ever rising cost of the Prime membership when they don't care to follow through with their "promise" of certain things.
I LOVE AMAZON!

This app has been very useful but since this last update, it seems to have found a glitch. Any time I'm looking at an item and I will have to look at a text, or anything else, when I go back to the item the app refreshes and I lose what I'm looking at and have to start from scratch again. This has been very annoying and time-consuming. I sure hope that this gets addressed and fixed soon. But then I guess I tend to spend less money as after a few times of this happenin my frustrations say enough.
